name: UpgradeMyDay
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Upgrade My Rituals will teach you the art and science of building healthy routines around your day. We are only as good as our systems we have in place and a morning routine sometimes is just not enough. This briefing will be your daily dose to help with mind-body techniques, productivity hacks, and a lot more helping you along your journey to becoming the best version of yourself.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
